law.catch_line: Agreement on standards concerning rights and duties.

text.section: The parties may determine by agreement the standards measuring the fulfillment of the rights of a debtor or obligor and the duties of a secured party under a rule stated in KRS 355.9-602 if the standards are not manifestly unreasonable.
Subsection (1) of this section does not apply to the duty under KRS 355.9-609 to refrain from breaching the peace.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 121, effective July 1, 2001.
